remarks: Left-associative property of an associative algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isassa.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
isassa.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
isassa.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
isassa.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
isassa.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) $.
assaass $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ ( A e. B /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) $.
